servicedescription: Testwebservice with a Triple Store backend

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?the_geom WHERE{ ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q515 . ?item wdt:P625 ?the_geom . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language '[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en'. } }
datasets.name: WikidataCity

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?label ?lat ?lon WHERE{ ?item rdf:type lgdo:Bar ; rdfs:label ?label ; geo-pos:lat ?lat ; geo-pos:long ?lon . }
datasets.name: OSMBar

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?label ?lat ?lon WHERE{ ?item rdf:type gn:Feature ; rdfs:label ?label ; geo-pos:lat ?lat ; geo-pos:long ?lon . }
datasets.name: GeoNamesPlace

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?rel ?val ?lat ?lon WHERE{ ?item rdf:type dbo:Airport ; ?rel ?val; geo-pos:lat ?lat ; geo-pos:long ?lon . FILTER(langMatches(lang(?label),'EN')) }
datasets.name: DBPediaAirport

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?rel ?val ?the_geom WHERE{ ?item rdf:type ign:NamedPlace . ?item ?rel ?val . OPTIONAL{?val geo:asWKT ?the_geom .} }
datasets.name: NamedPlace

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?the_geom WHERE{ ?a rdf:type pleiades:Place . ?a pleiades:hasLocation ?item . ?item geo:asWKT ?the_geom . }
datasets.name: PleiadesLocations

datasets.query: SELECT ?item ?rel ?val ?the_geom WHERE{ ?item rdf:type xplan4:BP_Wegerecht . ?item ?rel ?val . OPTIONAL{?val geo:asWKT ?the_geom .} }
datasets.name: XPlanungWegerechtHamburg
